title: Patch 6.12 is live

embed.description: Greetings, Summoners. Welcome the Patch 6.12, the ARAM patch. While there are a decent amount of non-Howling-Abyss changes here, we figured we'd take this opportunity to speak directly to the poro-lovers of Murder Bridge. We don't often make straight adjustments to ARAM as a mode, so let's slap some context on that.

body:
Patch 6.12 is now live in OCE. If you discover any issues or bugs after patching please post them here and we'll investigate.

Have a great day & see you on the rift!

Mindstar

replies.body:
Champ Mastery’s now on all maps. Finally. ”

FRELJORD’S FINEST :  Champ Mastery points can be earned in matchmade Howling Abyss games 

I did not get any mastery points in my aram game I played about 30 min ago, what gives?
just played a game of aram... didnt get any mastery points.... fml
just had the same thing happen to me, either its a bug that needs to be fixed or Riot lied to us.

Hi

Looks like there might have been a little bit of confusion here.  In the patch notes it says this will be turned on "over the course of 6.12".  Ie. It isn't on with the patch deploy, but will be out soon.

Hope that clears things up!

Cheers
Mindstar

o man this patch full stuffed my client i couldnt update so i did all the things on the support page then the repair feature refused to work so i had to uninstall and reinstall and update took about 6 7 hours for me just to see the play buttom needless to say i didnt play yesturday spewing
